      • from

        public static LocalVirtualMachine from​(long pid)
                                throws IOException
        Get an instance from a process id and makes sure the a JMX agent is running on it.
        Parameters:
        pid - process id of the jvm to attach to.
        Returns:
        a virtual machine with a JMX endpoint available.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any operations failed.
